data.text: @alyyjandraa @KimKardashian It’s the society who connects the word “retarded” to people who are anorexic or have special needs. So you all going off on the word retarded which is incorrectly associated with special needs ppl. Retarded can be anyone who does a stupid thing!
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian She is held to a different standard. She sells herself to influence other people. She made a mistake, but she should be better.
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian No. I don’t “slip” and use it. My brother has autism among other challenges. Not ok. Ever.
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian And no, our society sure did not 'make it ok' to say it. I'm 35 and it's never been okay to say in my lifetime. People say it, I call them out every time.
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian I have never called someone the r word or called something the r word. Only time I've used it is in reference when telling people not to use the word.

@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian There are plenty of things society ‘made okay’ that are not okay. There’s no defense. The R-word’s been ‘not okay’ for ~20 years. That’s enough time to get it out of your vocab, PARTICULARLY on social media. End of story. ‘Let her live’ does not apply here. Why apologize for her?
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian your a child..Kim’s a fool as are you little girl
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian How do you accidentally post it to your it story?? Pure ignorance.
@alyyjandraa your Tweet was quoted in an article by @BuzzFeed  https://t.co/SD4fXag573
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian The Kardashians are trash that got rich over the death of innocent people. Get over it.
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian Bitch please lots of people use hateful words and it doesn't make it right. He over yourself
@Cyn190 @alyyjandraa @KimKardashian Their are bigger problems going on in the world than Kim k lol it’s not that serious
@alyyjandraa @KimKardashian https://t.co/4dYIvgy2TW is not okay to say and I myself have never said it.I am also a mother of a special needs daughter and have always found it offensive
